description: An illustration of the bust of Nefertiti, the Great Royal Wife of Pharaoh Akhenaten during the 18th Dynasty of Ancient Egypt. The bust shows the side profile of a woman from the clavicle upwards: she has reddish-brown skin, dark eyebrows and eyes, and she is wearing a broad gold collar and a deep blueish green cylindrical crown with a brownish band wrapped around it. The illustration is made out of a series of triangles of various sizes.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
